name: Magic Princess: Dress Up Games
description:
Do you want to dress up as a 3D magic princess? Magic Princess makes your dreams come true!
Magic Princess is a fashionable ultra-casual simulation girl game with a strong anime style, suitable for all unique girls to play!

In the world of Magic Princess, you can give full play to your imagination and design your own girl doll image. You can dress up gorgeous dresses and comb stylish hairstyles; you can also put on exquisite makeup and do a sparkling manicure; you can also raise cute pets and have different styles of rooms!

Come to Magic Princess to create a beautiful, cute and noble little princess! Create your own 3d doll character through dressing up, interact with your favorite anime character, let her participate in the PK competition and get more exquisite dresses!

【Game Description】
> Create your own anime cartoon doll character, unique and elegant 3d style!
> A lot of exquisite stylized clothing, ever-changing hairstyles, match as you like!
> Silky character movements and delicate girl modeling! Never let you down!
> Interact with the created doll character and capture her cute moves!
> Participate in PK and dress up and train characters to get more exquisite suits!

【Game Features】
> Makeup and dress up the girl character, and interact with friends PK!
> Various hairstyles, different skin tones, dress up anime characters!
> Makeover girls into superstar icons or any other styles you like!
> Share dynamic princess characters with friends and dress up the cutest magical girl together!
> Exquisite and appropriate makeup, well-arranged anime room scenes, a different photo experience!

【Share Dress】
If you like your Magic Princess look, please share your look on Snapchat, Instagram, TikTok and other social media! Magic Princess can get more likes, likes and followers for your posts and stories.
